title: WinX Mobile Video Converter 4.0.1 Multilanguage-LAXiTY
description:
================
 [INFO:]
================


WinX Mobile Video Converter 4.0.1 Multilanguage-LAXiTY | 19.3 MB

It is a brand-new fast video converter to convert MKV, AVI, MP4, WMV, MOV, FLV, AVCHD, M2TS videos to any pop Android mobiles, tablets and players, which enables you to play different videos on The New HTC One, Android Samsung Galaxy S4, Galaxy Note, Amazon Kindle Fire, Google Nexus 7, etc. It has as many as 200 built-in profiles, covering all prevailed Android devices with different resolutions and screen sizes.

 Besides converting SD/HD/Multi-track HD videos to Android compatible video/music formats stably, it also can convert Blu-ray M2TS videos, HDTV videos, camcorder and phone recorded videos to Apple iPhone 4S/5, iPad Mini, iPad 4, Microsoft WP8 and Nokia mobiles to fulfill your dream of playing any videos on Android iOS Google devices on the go!


Unique High-end Technologies:

 - A rare mobile video converter that supports multi-track MKV, M2TS, AVCHD, HDTV, BDAV and MPEG-TS videos as input.
 - Cover-all Profiles - Embedded with about 200 ready-made profiles for Android and other mobile devices so that you can convert MKV to iPad, etc. 
 - High Quality Engine - This internally installed feature lets you full get excellent image and audio quality, almost like the original ones.
 - Deinterlacing - "Yadif Double Frames" is added to change interlaced video scanning to progressive scanning, which delivers higher image effect.

Convert/Compress HD Videos for Android Phones and Tabs:
 - Support a wide range of HD videos, even including HD Camcorder (e.g. JVC MOD) video, multi-track HD, Blu-ray M2TS videos and HDTV videos.
 - Convert or shrink HD videos to suitable video formats accepted by Android smartphones, tablets, Android media players, iPhone, iPad, etc.
 - Grab audio from videos & YouTube to MP3, WMA, AC3, AAC, DTS, FLAC, ALAC, etc; make ringtone for Android mobile phone and iPhone.
 - Extract pictures from the video in PNG format and save as mobile phone wallpapers.

Fast Speed, High Quality and Ease-to-Use:
 - Take full advantage of multi-core CPU (up to 8 cores) to increase the video processing speed.
 - Support video conversion in batch mode to allow adding more than one video file at one time. 
 - Provide "Advanced De-interlace Accelerator" "High Quality Engine" "Intelligent A/V Synchronizer" options to make higher quality.
- UserÃ¢â‚¬â€œfriendly interface is designed to make the video converting like A-B-C.

Versatile Video Editing Features:
 - Adjust audio volume, crop videos, expand video resolution, and adding external *.srt subtitle to your downloaded videos.
 - Edit parameters like video bitrates, video resolution, frame rate, etc. to customize video audio quality and file size.
 - Merge several videos to a whole video file; Trim videos to define the start or end time and make video clips.
 - Support Batch Mode to convert two or more videos together at one time.
 - Auto Fix Incorrect Data - If your original video can't be played properly due to corrupted file or abnormal ratio, this Mobile Video Converter can automatically mend the incorrect data and continue the conversion smoothly.




Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
Language : English
